title: Calories in a Chicken Drumstick
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken drumstick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per drumstick, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Skin-on, bone-in chicken drumstick, roasted without added oil or seasonings; ~91 g edible portion.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin removal, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken drumstick with skin has ~172 kcal and ~19 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: About 172 kcal for a roasted, skin-on drumstick.

faqs.q: Is protein high in chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Yes, ~18.6 g protein per drumstick, great for muscle support.
Around 112 kcal, lower fat than skin-on.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”roasted is lower; fried adds ~80 kcal from oil absorption.

faqs.q: What about sodium in chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: ~77 mg naturally; marinated or sauced versions increase it.
